title: Nutriota Alpha Lipoic Acid | 500 mg (180 Capsules)
aboutContent: WHY BUY NUTRIOTA ALPHA LIPOIC ACID? - Each serving contains 500mg of pure ALA, which promotes the maintenance of normal blood sugar levels and nerve health. This powerful antioxidant also offers processes that counteract aging. With 180 capsules per bottle, this product offers excellent value for a 6-month supply and is suitable for vegans and vegetarians.
descriptionContent: ALA Alpha Lipoic Acid 500mg helps reduce inflammation, control the maintenance of normal blood sugar levels, and supports nervous system health. Our body naturally produces minimal amounts of ALA. This extra-strength vegan supplement provides the powerful antioxidant support your body needs.
ingredientsContent: Alpha Lipoic Acid, Anti-caking agent: Magnesium stearate, silicon dioxide Tablet coating: Hydroxypropyl methyl Cellulose
generalInfoContent:
